welcome.title: Welcome to BodyMetrics
welcome.subtitle: Your private and secure bioimpedance management tool.
welcome.step1_text: This app does NOT upload data to the cloud. Everything is saved in this browser (your device).
welcome.step2_text: Weigh as 'Guest' > Upload SD card files (.csv) here > Assign measurements to clients.
welcome.step3_text: Make frequent backups in Settings. If you clear cache, clients are lost (but not SD data).
welcome.cta: To start, create your first client:
welcome.privacy_hint: ⚠️ For privacy, use CODES (e.g., CLI-001) and/or ALIASES instead of real names. Keep the real link in a private Excel.

upload.instruction_path: Path: SD CARD > TANITA > GRAPHV1 > DATA > Select all files (.csv)
upload.drop_zone: Drag & Drop all CSV files here (DATA1.CSV...)

dashboard.inbox_empty: No pending measurements. Upload SD files.
dashboard.select_client_prompt: Select a client to view history and charts.
dashboard.delete_client_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this client and unlink their data?

settings.title: Data Management
settings.backup_desc: Save your client list and assignments to a .json file. Save app data to use on another device or in case browser data is cleared.
settings.privacy_warning_text: Client-Data relationships are saved in this browser.

privacy_points.1: Clearing cache deletes names (not medical data).
privacy_points.3: You are responsible for real name privacy.

settings.delete_all_confirm: WARNING: This will delete ALL clients and assignments from this browser. Are you sure?
